description: Enable your LLMs to perform accurate numerical calculations with a simple API. Leverage basic arithmetic and statistical functions to enhance your applications. Simplify complex mathematical tasks effortlessly and improve your model's capabilities.

capabilities.name: add
capabilities.description: Adds two numbers together

capabilities.name: subtract
capabilities.description: Subtracts the second number from the first number

capabilities.name: multiply
capabilities.description: Multiplies two numbers together

capabilities.name: division
capabilities.description: Divides the first number by the second number

capabilities.name: sum
capabilities.description: Adds any number of numbers together

capabilities.name: modulo
capabilities.description: Divides two numbers and returns the remainder

capabilities.name: mean
capabilities.description: Calculates the arithmetic mean of a list of numbers

capabilities.name: median
capabilities.description: Calculates the median of a list of numbers

capabilities.name: mode
capabilities.description: Finds the most common number in a list of numbers

capabilities.name: min
capabilities.description: Finds the minimum value from a list of numbers

capabilities.name: max
capabilities.description: Finds the maximum value from a list of numbers

capabilities.name: floor
capabilities.description: Rounds a number down to the nearest integer

capabilities.name: ceiling
capabilities.description: Rounds a number up to the nearest integer

capabilities.name: round
capabilities.description: Rounds a number to the nearest integer

capabilities.name: sin
capabilities.description: Calculates the sine of a number in radians

capabilities.name: arcsin
capabilities.description: Calculates the arcsine of a number in radians

capabilities.name: cos
capabilities.description: Calculates the cosine of a number in radians

capabilities.name: arccos
capabilities.description: Calculates the arccosine of a number in radians

capabilities.name: tan
capabilities.description: Calculates the tangent of a number in radians

capabilities.name: arctan
capabilities.description: Calculates the arctangent of a number in radians

capabilities.name: radiansToDegrees
capabilities.description: Converts a radian value to its equivalent in degrees

capabilities.name: degreesToRadians
capabilities.description: Converts a degree value to its equivalent in radians
